name: Clientele: Sexy Deckbuilder
description:
Start your new career as a sex worker with a small amount of cash and a basic deck. As you take contracts and satisfy your Clients, you'll earn the cash needed to make a stronger deck, xp to increase performance, and skills to upgrade new perks that will help you take on the more demanding Clients. Welcome to Clientele. It's a challenging deckbulider where you have to manage your own sexy business. Keep track of your progress and current abilities to perform, if you don't, you may take on more than you can handle. Nothings more awkward than failing to satisfy your paying Client.

Features

  • Contracts: Choose between a multitude of women who want what you have and are willing to pay for it.
  • Deckbuilding: Keep your deck in tip-top-shape through buying, selling, and building a big deck that even the most challenging Clients can't resist.
  • Cards: There are 100+ cards to buy, sell, and collect with more to come in Early Access.
  • Satisfy: Help your Clients reach Climax before you run out of Stamina. Use Foreplay and Climax cards to your advantage to get them there.
  • XP: Every successful contract will net you experience that will level up your character and boost your skills.
  • Skill Points: Gain the upperhand by unlocking new perks that will further your business and personal skills.
